Section.Catchline: Matters which must be judicially noticed.

SectionBody.Text: A court shall take judicial notice of:

Subsection.Text: Decisional, constitutional, and public statutory law and resolutions of the Florida Legislature and the Congress of the United States.
Florida rules of court that have statewide application, its own rules, and the rules of United States courts adopted by the United States Supreme Court.
Rules of court of the United States Supreme Court and of the United States Courts of Appeal.
